The study complete 60 patient [ 30 patient group ] . - The primary outcome measure absence clinical sign suggestive infective vaginitis vaginal swab negative bacterial , trichomonal candidal vaginitis 8th day start treatment [ Effectiveness induce remission ] . - The secondary outcome measure 1. absence clinical sign suggestive infective vaginitis 2. vaginal swab negative bacterial , trichomonal candidal vaginitis 29th day start treatment [ Effectiveness maintain remission ] ability complete 3day course without break experience intolerable side effect [ Tolerability ] .
